sentences.english: The Jiegou coalmine is situated at southern Huaibei coalfield, designed capacity is 0.
sentences.chinese: 界沟煤矿位于淮北煤田南部，设计生产能力为0。

sentences.english: Coal bed gas parameter well SPMT-1 is located at the Shiping well field, Guxu mining area, South Sichuan Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 1号煤层气参数井位于川南煤田古叙矿区石屏井田。

sentences.english: The existence of Jinci Formation in Tengxian coalfield is confirmed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还论证了滕县煤田晋祠组的存在。

sentences.english: Supervision mechanism is gradually introduced into coal geological exploration.
sentences.chinese: 煤田地质勘探工程正逐步引进监理工作制。

sentences.english: Slow fault structure is commonly developed in every mining area or mining well in Longyong Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 缓断裂构造普遍发育于龙永煤田各个矿区或井田。

sentences.english: Re-activity of coalfield structure by about E-W directional stretch since Neogene.
sentences.chinese: 新近纪以来近东西向拉张，煤田构造的现代活动。

sentences.english: Huainan coalfield is rich in coalbed methane resources and has large - scale coalmine methane drainage.
sentences.chinese: 淮南煤田煤层气资源丰富，煤层气抽采具备较大规模。

sentences.english: The Heshan coalfield is typical karstic water filling deposit; water disaster is serious during coal mining.
sentences.chinese: 合山煤田是典型的岩溶充水矿床，矿井开采水害严重。

sentences.english: There are complex structure and fold developed in Longyong coal-field.
sentences.chinese: 龙永煤田构造复杂，褶曲发育。

sentences.english: There are reference value for safely mining of coalbed in shallow part of Double-Huai (Huainan and Huaibei) coal-fields.
sentences.chinese: 对两淮煤田浅部煤层的安全开采具有参考价值。

sentences.english: These decided high stress and high gas content in Hebi coalfield.
sentences.chinese: 这决定了鹤壁煤田的高应力和高瓦斯含量的地质背景。

sentences.english: The geological prospecting and mining history has been reviewed, in the coal basin of western Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 文章回顾了京西煤田已往地质勘查及开采状况。

sentences.english: The total sulphur content of the Liuzhi coal is higher than that of the Shuicheng coal.
sentences.chinese: 六枝煤田的全硫含量明显高于水城煤田。

sentences.english: The total sulphur content of the Liuzhi coal is higher than that of the Shuicheng coal.
sentences.chinese: 六枝煤田的全硫含量明显高于水城煤田。

sentences.english: The coal cleat pattern in the Kushiro coalfield, Japan, shows some analogy to isolated straight joints.
sentences.chinese: 日本钏路煤田的煤层割理形态类似于孤立的直线节理。

sentences.english: Analyzing harmfulness degree of the hazard and evaluating the risk of the hazards' damage.
sentences.chinese: 宁东煤田采煤地质灾害损害程度分析与风险评价研究。

definition: remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
